name: Appointment of Shri N. N. Tripathi, IPS (WB:2009) as DIG, CISF on deputation basis

to: The Chief Secretary, Government of West Bengal, Kolkata-711102.

from: Under Secretary to the Govt. of India
details.subject: Appointment of Shri N. N. Tripathi, IPS (WB:2009) as Deputy Inspector General in Central Industrial Security Force (CISF) against existing vacancies on deputation basis for a period of five years from the date of assumption of the charge of the post or until further orders, whichever is earlier.
